alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; NW Blount; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:26PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN BLOUNT... SOUTHWESTERN COCKE AND SEVIER COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 626 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Gatlinburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Smoky Mountains-Clingmans Dome, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Pittman Center, Townsend, and Wears Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; NW Blount; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke; Sevier Smoky Mountains
